graphql.query:
query sexualVariables($enrollmentUuid: ID!, $searchKey: String, $offset: Int, $limit: Int) {
        sexualVariables(enrollmentUuid: $enrollmentUuid, searchKey: $searchKey, offset: $offset, limit: $limit) {
          id
          uuid
          enrollmentId
          orgasms_per_typical_average_week
          highest_no_of_orgasms_in_n_last_months
          age_at_first_exposure_to_sem
          no_of_times_viewed_sem_over_lifetime
          createdBy
          updatedBy
          createdAt
          updatedAt
        }
      }

mutation updateSexualVariable($input: UpdateSexualVariableInput!) { 
  updateSexualVariable(input: $input) {
    id
    uuid
    enrollmentId
    orgasms_per_typical_average_week
    highest_no_of_orgasms_in_n_last_months
    age_at_first_exposure_to_sem
    no_of_times_viewed_sem_over_lifetime
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}
